page.description: Specify the sub-theme to use for the button.

discussion.p: A sub-theme is a variation on the base style for a control. Click the [...] button to open the sub-theme picker. A list of available sub-themes for the control will be shown. All controls have a 'base' sub-theme if the UX Component uses a Version 4 style sheet.
You can create your own sub-themes using the [Style sub-theme and CSS 'tweaks'] property.
